byline.original: By STEVEN LEE MYERS and ANDREW E. KRAMER
byline.contributor: Steven Lee Myers reported from Washington, and Andrew E. Kramer from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: With Russia becoming a focus of the presidential campaign, Mr. Manafort’s work and business dealings in Ukraine have come under scrutiny.

headline.print_headline: Before Running Trump’s Bid,  Wielding Influence in Ukraine
headline.main: How Paul Manafort Wielded Power in Ukraine Before Advising Donald Trump

snippet: With Russia becoming a focus of the presidential campaign, Mr. Manafort’s work and business dealings in Ukraine have come under scrutiny....
abstract: History of dealings between Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort and Ukrainian and Russian business and political elites raises questions after hacking of Democratic National Committee’s emails is linked to Russian spies; review of Manafort's political strategies as consultant in Ukraine reveals echoes of Trump’s populist campaign.
